title: Alpes x Griefjoy à l’Olympia - Converse Avant-Poste
description:
Alpes produces a heavy, hypnotic sounds always accompanied by their signature carefree vocals. 

Launched in September 2013, the Converse Avant-Poste program grew out of a collaboration between Converse and New Casino with the goal of promoting young talent from the French music scene.

In just a year and a half, Converse Avant-Poste has managed to aid the discovery of many talents, such as Fakear, Samba De La Muerte, Chill Bump, Encore !, Banquise and more.

To celebrate the success after two season Converse Avant-Poste has this year launched a new challenge, a concert in an exceptional music venue, Olympia, and give the opportunity to 3 Converse Avant-Poste bands to performed at this mythical venue.

Shot by Vivien Fossez.
